metadata.title: Alessandro Amelly - Website Development and IT Solutions
metadata.description: bitrey.dev by Alessandro Amella - Website development for individuals and businesses, web applications and custom software.
metadata.keywords: web developer, software developer, full stack developer, Modena developer, Bologna programmer, computer science graduate, University of Bologna, Brno University of Technology, microcontroller programming, IT consulting

homepage.mainDescription: Computer Science student at the University of Bologna, ex-Erasmus at Brno University of Technology, developer, {years} years old, living in Modena

descriptions.0: I studied computer science and telecommunications at ITIS Fermi in Modena, graduating with 98/100.
descriptions.1: I am currently studying at Alma Mater, and I am aiming for a master's degree in AI (somewhere).

otherInterstsRadio.title: Radio and telecommunications: diploma in telecom. and

otherInterestsList.2: Photography, video editing and music mixing (DJing)

homepage.someProjectsDescription: These are just some of the projects I have worked on, many more are on GitHub.
homepage.contactSubtitle: For quotes, consultations or information, you can contact me through the following form (or via the channels at the bottom right).
homepage.otherChannels: You can also find me on
homepage.webDevelopmentDescription: Development of websites, web applications and custom software.
homepage.consultingDescription: Consulting on IT problems, choice of technologies and solutions.

footer.emailBody: Hello! I would like to ask you for some information about...

contact.sendError: Error sending message :( Please try again later.

infolog.description: System administrator at Infolog S.r.l. in Modena, where I worked with the development team to create a web application for warehouse management.

seta.description: Internship at the public transport company SETA S.p.A. in Modena, where I developed the software for generating audio files for announcements on buses. I also performed data analysis to train a machine learning model for passenger counting.

fertec.description: Design and development of advanced software solutions, including microservice systems for IoT, cost analysis software, mobile and web applications.

freelance.description: Development of websites, web applications and custom software for individuals and businesses.

bamboosim.title: BambooSIM
bamboosim.description: An online eSIM card store with a custom CMS for managing products, orders and customers. Integration with multiple payment gateways and cloud services.

ezaffitto.title: ezaffitto
ezaffitto.description: Fully automated rental ad collector from various websites with AI (OpenAI) parsing structured as microservices.

kinocafe.title: Kinó Café
kinocafe.description: Website for a café to manage orders, print receipts via WebSockets to a POS printer, send data to an ESP32 display using the Web Serial API, show the menu, serve as a front page, and handle user registration.

vhfesuperiori.title: VHF e superiori
vhfesuperiori.description: An event manager and social network for radio amateurs curated by volunteers. A place to share your creations, connections (QSO) and meet new people.

occupalostudente.title: Occupa lo Studente
occupalostudente.description: A web application for job searching that connects companies and students of the I.T.I.S. E. Fermi di Modena. Institutional login via Google OAuth 2.0.

tpldisplay.title: TPL Display
tpldisplay.description: Real-time bus departure board, dockerized, interfaced with the TPL data of Bologna and Modena, with caching (Redis) and automatic update.

wolfsurvival.title: Wolf Survival
wolfsurvival.description: Website of a survival school with Next.js frontend and backend connected to the Meta (Facebook) API to show the latest courses, photos and videos of the activities carried out.

om.title: Quiz O.M.
om.description: A radio amateur quiz to prepare for the exam to obtain the Italian ham radio operator's license.
